ygData.subject: Re: Twinking & Kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: nope...dot spells do damage while you re running the creature around...dot, run, cast, cast, run, dot, cast....something like that......works pretty good if
ygData.messageBody:
nope...dot spells do damage while you're running the creature around...dot,
run, cast, cast, run, dot, cast....something like that......works pretty good
if you have enough mana to finish it off.....course i heard from a freind that
a bard and a druid are a great combo for kiting...they were doing that with a
cyclops just dotting and bellowing at it around a gypsy camp

David Bradshaw wrote:

> From: "David Bradshaw" <Logain@...>
>
> What did they tag team playing the character? Keep it going 24/7?
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, July 12, 1999 12:52 PM
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Twinking & Kiting
>
> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
> The most extreme case of twinking I have seen is making level 30 with 10
> game days played.
>
> Mr. J Daniels
>
> On Mon, 12 Jul 1999, Rob Berryhill wrote:
>
> > From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
> >
> > Absolutely NO way that is true. Even with MAJOR twinking they still would
> > not hit well. 5 days would be an accomplishment, and 5 hours is just WAY
> > beyond impossible.
> >
> > Astur, Cleric of Brell
> > Solusek Ro
> >
> > > From: "KAUFFMAN,ROBERT (HP-FtCollins,ex1)"
> > > <robert_kauffman@...>
> > >
> > > heard of a guild that can have a new character to level 20 in 5 hours
> with
> > > this method.
> > >
> > > Fidan
